query.text:
&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Declare; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Select;
if dbo.AI_ERP$Function$CheckSQLInjection(@stt_rec) = 0 return &GLTranReportSql; else begin declare @m_ma_nt0 varchar(10), @key varchar(128), @h_line1 as nvarchar(128), @h_line2 as nvarchar(128), @h_line3 as nvarchar(128), @h_line4 as nvarchar(128), @bilingual tinyint select @m_ma_nt0 = val from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @h_line1 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC005' select @h_line2 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC006' select @h_line3 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC007' select @h_line4 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC008'
if @@form in ('070', '080') begin declare @ngay_ct0 smalldatetime, @dvcs0 varchar(33) select @ngay_ct0 = ngay_ct, @dvcs0 = ma_dvcs from @@prime$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4 exec rs_rptPrintCDTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct0, @ngay_ct0, '51', @dvcs0, @stt_rec, '1', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin select 'rptPrintCDTran_02_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
-- Version 1 if exists (select 1 from kbsdmauin where controller = 'CDTran' and version = 'v1' and status = '1') begin if @@form in ('051', '061', '151', '161') begin select @bilingual = 1 select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba,rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh ,rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, a.ma_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'V') as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'V') as t_tt_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'E') as t_tt_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'E') as t_tt_nt_in_word2, a.so_ct_goc as so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, a.so_ct, a.tk, a.ty_gia, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') as ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') as thang, str(year(ngay_ct),4) as nam, stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintCDTran2 @@language, @key, 'd51$$partition$current', 'r30$$partition$current', @@id, @bilingual &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result; return end
if @@form in ('010', '020', '011', '021', '030', '040', '110', '120', '111', '121') begin declare @ngay_ct smalldatetime, @dvcs varchar(33) select @ngay_ct = ngay_ct, @dvcs = ma_dvcs from @@prime$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4
if @@form in ('030', '040') begin exec rs_rptPrintCDTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '51', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '2', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin select 'rptPrintCDTran_01_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
if @@form in ('011', '021', '111', '121') begin exec rs_rptPrintCDTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '51', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '1', '2', @@language, @@userID, @@admin if @@form in ('011', '021') select 'rptPrintCDTran_01BI_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; else select case @@form when '111' then 'CDTran_BIv1' else 'CDTranFC_BIv1' end as templateFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
exec rs_rptPrintCDTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '51', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '1', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin if @@form in ('010', '020') select 'rptPrintCDTran_01_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; else select case @@form when '110' then '&Circular.TemplateFile.CDTran;' else '&Circular.TemplateFileFC.CDTran;' end as templateFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba,rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh ,rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, a.ma_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @@language) as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @@language) as t_tt_nt_in_word, a.so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, a.so_ct, a.tk, a.ty_gia, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, str(year(ngay_ct),4) nam, stt_rec, @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintCDTran2 @@language, @key, 'd51$$partition$current', 'r30$$partition$current', @@id, @bilingual &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result; return end
-- Previous version if @@form in ('011', '021', '031', '041', '051', '061', '111', '121', '151', '161') begin select @bilingual = 1 select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba,rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh ,rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, a.t_tt as t_tien, a.t_tt_nt as t_tien_nt, a.ma_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'V') as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'V') as t_tt_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'E') as t_tt_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'E') as t_tt_nt_in_word2, a.so_ct_goc as so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, a.so_ct, a.tk, a.ty_gia, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, str(year(ngay_ct),4) nam, stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec end else begin select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba,rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh ,rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, a.t_tt as t_tien, a.t_tt_nt as t_tien_nt, a.ma_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @@language) as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @@language) as t_tt_nt_in_word, a.so_ct_goc as so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, a.so_ct, a.tk, a.ty_gia, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, str(year(ngay_ct),4) nam, stt_rec, @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec end select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' if @@form in ('130', '140', '050', '060', '051', '061', '151', '161') begin exec rs_PrintCDTran2 @@language, @key, 'd51$$partition$current', 'r30$$partition$current', @@id, @bilingual end else exec rs_PrintCDTran @@language, @key, 'd51$$partition$current', 'r30$$partition$current' end
&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result;

header.v: Phiếu chi tiền mặt dạng tệp xlsx (Excel)
